answerText: fixation [or anything involving the word "fix"][10] During fixation, adding DAPI to the tissue colors these organelles blue. These organelles contain DNA.

subject: Science
question: Question: Glutaraldehyde or neutral-buffered formalin are commonly used for this purpose, and a solution named for Zenker used to do this contains mercuric chloride and sodium sulfate. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this technique from histology in which a section of tissue is attached to a slide. This process is used to prevent degradation of the samples.
